Title: Sea Me Now
Writer: Dan Fybel, Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: Teddy tries to impress his ex-wife by organizing a day trip on his newly refurbished boat; Tina attempts to prove she's responsible enough to have a cellphone by taking care Bob's prized eraser.
